prompts: Create a cheerful Pokemon with big ears and a bright smile.
Imagine a small, energetic creature that loves to play in the grass.
Show me a cute Pokemon that sparks joy and has a vibrant color palette.
Design a playful companion Pokemon with a love for electric energy.
Generate a tiny Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and loves attention.
Give me an adorable Pokemon with a sunny disposition and red accents.
Make a lively Pokemon that can spread happiness to its friends.
